${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:DispersionG.NAME: Dispersion G
${modID}:DispersionG.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DispersionI.NAME: Dispersion I
${modID}:DispersionI.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DispersionV.NAME: Dispersion V
${modID}:DispersionV.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RayOfLight.NAME: Ray of Light
${modID}:RayOfLight.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Dispersions to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
